posts.head: Hijacking and technology
posts.body: I’m an expert on how technology hijacks our psychological vulnerabilities. That’s why I spent the last three years  Design Ethicist at Google caring about how to design things in a way that defends a billion people’s minds from getting hijacked. .
posts.snippet: It’s easier to fool people than to convince them that they’ve been fooled. — Unknown.

posts.head: Eleven Reasons To Be Excited About The Future of Technology
posts.body: In the year 1820, a person could expect to live less than 35 years, 94% of the global population lived in extreme poverty, and less that 20% of the population was literate.
posts.snippet: The strongest force propelling human progress has been the swift advance and wide diffusion of technology. — The Economist
